page.title: 15Domestic Electrical Gadgets.
page.content: These are percentages of homes owning electrical gadgets in Tuffley. 100 Hair drier 68 Saw 99 Freezer 65 Fire Fridge Toys Washing Machine 64 Food Mixer 98 TV 62 Shaver 97 Kettle 60 Tumble Drier Vacuum cleaner 59 Carving knife 93 Record player 57 Doorbell 92 Lawn mower 50 Video 90 Drill 47 Sander Radio alarm clock 43 Computer 86 Telephone 41 Blanket 83 Cassette recorder 38 Deep frier 82 Clock 37 Typewriter 78 Toaster 36 Instruments 76 Digital clock 35 Video games 73 Steam iron 33 Coffee maker Curling tongs 29 Dry iron Battery charger 28 Storage heat
